page.title: 20GAMES WE PLAY 2
page.content: pick teams and one team has to call out a name and they say "Red Rover, Red Rover we call over Clare Smith". Then Clare Smith has to run up and they both have to run to see whether they get through the peoples hands. If they do they go back to their team but if they don't they have to stop with the other team. 4 Skipping In the play ground we play games like skipping, two people hold the rope and one or two or three people can skip in the middle. If there are three people you can play right side, wrong side, a person finishing on the side is out. 5 Mob When it is dark we go out, one boy goes on it he counts to a hundred and we hide. He comes to look for us, if he goes past us we run out and mob him
